post:
HostSlick has a simple aim. We provide our customers with high quality servers but keep prices down. We have networks in both Lelystad, Netherlands and London, UK and have an average ticket response time of around 25-45 minutes at most.
Our goals are to offer our valued clients a great experience and offer the best Affordable and most Reliable Hosting arround.

Why HostSlick?

  • All Nodes with Intel XEON E3, E5 or better and RAID10 arrays
  • Easy-to-use Control Panels: cPanel, Virtualizor and SolusVM
  • Flexibility - You can upgrade/downgrade anytime. Custom quotes possible
  • Wide range of Payment methods accepted: PayPal, Credit Card, Bitcoin and more!
  • DDoS Protection included in any Packages. Corero Smartwalls up to 100Gbps
  • Additional IPs on request at anytime, $1.50/IPv4 - IPv6 is free of charge!
  • We Colocate with Datacenters and own all our Hardware.

So, which offers does HostSlick have for Christmas/New year time of the year?
We have re-stocked our sold out LET Specials and offer 10% additional discount till 04th January 2019 using coupon: 8W93KNIR9F*
